quarks.providers.development

Class DevelopmentProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.topology.spi.AbstractTopologyProvider<DirectTopology>
      • quarks.providers.direct.DirectProvider
        • quarks.providers.development.DevelopmentProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectSubmitter<Topology,Job>, Submitter<Topology,Job>, TopologyProvider

    public class DevelopmentProvider
extends DirectProvider
    Provider intended for development. This provider executes topologies using DirectProvider and extends it by:
    • starting an embedded web-server providing the Quarks development console that shows live graphs for running applications.
    • Creating a metrics registry with metrics registered in the platform MBean server.
    • Add a ControlService that registers control management beans in the platform MBean server.
    • Add tuple count metrics on all the streams before submitting a topology. The implementation calls Metrics.counter(Topology) to insert CounterOp oplets into each stream.
